Class Consumer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Consumer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    User
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Producer

    public class Consumer
extends Object
implements User
    Consumer Type of user with the ability to like, search documents follow users, act in the case of being randomly selected
    Author:

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Initialzes all variables like above constructor with the addition of an Array list of payoffs
